description: [Wizard Spider](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0102) has used PowerShell cmdlets `Get-GPPPassword` and `Find-GPOPassword` to find unsecured credentials in a compromised network group policy.(Citation: Mandiant FIN12 Oct 2021)

external_references.description: Shilko, J., et al. (2021, October 7). FIN12: The Prolific Ransomware Intrusion Threat Actor That Has Aggressively Pursued Healthcare Targets. Retrieved June 15, 2023.
